trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements that use a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref> to define their appearance.
trans-unit.target: Representerer basisklasse for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elementer som bruker en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"> </xref> til å definere utseendet.

trans-unit.source: The Control class is the base class for many of the controls you add to an application.
trans-unit.target: Klasse for knappekontrollen er basisklasse for mange av kontrollene som du legge til en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: The Control class defines very little behavior; while it is possible to add a Control to your application, it is far more common to add a control that inherits from Control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Klasse for knappekontrollen definerer lite virkemåte; Det er mulig å legge til en kontroll i programmet, er det mye mer vanlig å legge til en kontroll som arver fra kontroll, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Template%2A> property, which is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, specifies the appearance of the Control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Template%2A>egenskap, som er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, angir utseendet til kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Template%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the appearance of a control but retain its functionality, you should consider creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> instead of creating a new class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre utseendet til en kontroll, men beholde funksjonaliteten, bør du vurdere å opprette en ny <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>i stedet for å opprette en ny klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [stil og Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you want to create a control with custom behavior as well as allow others to customize its appearance, your control can inherit from the Control class and define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en kontroll med egendefinerte virkemåter, i tillegg til å la andre tilpasse utseendet kan kontrollen arve fra klassen kontrollen og definere <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: If you want to extend the behavior of an existing control, you can inherit from a class that inherits from Control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil utvide virkemåten til en eksisterende kontroll, kan du arve fra en klassen som arver fra kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A Control that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is not visible in your application, and setting the following properties has no effect unless the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> references them explicitly: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderThickness%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontFamily%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStretch%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontWeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> A common way to use these properties is to bind an element in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to the property.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll som ikke har en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>vises ikke i programmets og innstillingen følgende egenskaper har ingen virkning hvis det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>refererer til dem eksplisitt:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderThickness%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontFamily%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStretch%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontWeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A>en vanlig måte å bruke disse egenskapene er å binde et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontWeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStretch%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontFamily%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderThickness%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want your control to change color according to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> property, you can bind some property of an element in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil din kontrollen skal endre farge i henhold til verdien for eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>egenskapen du kan binde en egenskap for et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) to bind properties on a control to an element in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av [TemplateBinding Markup utvidelsen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) binde egenskaper for en kontroll til et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Control overrides the metadata of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> property and sets its default to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen overstyrer metadataene i <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>egenskapen og setter standard til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [avhengighet oversikt](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Called to arrange and size the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: For å ordne og endre størrelse på innholdet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The default control arrangement arranges only the first visual child.
trans-unit.target: Standard kontrollen Sortering ordner bare det første visual underordnet.

trans-unit.source: No transforms are applied.
trans-unit.target: Ingen transformeringer brukes.

trans-unit.source: The computed size that is used to arrange the content.
trans-unit.target: Beregnet størrelsen som brukes til å ordne innholdet.

trans-unit.source: The size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brush that describes the background of a control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en velgeren som beskriver bakgrunn for en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The Background property applies only to the resting state of a control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen bakgrunnen gjelder bare for vannrett tilstanden til en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The default style of the control specifies its appearance when the state of the control changes.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen kontrollens angir utseendet når tilstanden kontrollens endres.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the Background property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the button has that value only when it is not pressed or disabled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter egenskapen bakgrunnsbilde på for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, knappen har denne verdien bare når det ikke er trykket eller deaktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: If you want to create a control that has a more advanced customization of the background, you must define the control's style.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en kontroll som har en mer avansert tilpassing av bakgrunnen, må du definere kontrollens stil.

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the Background property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen bakgrunnen som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to fill the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Velgeren som brukes til å fylle bakgrunnen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brush that describes the border background of a control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en velgeren som beskriver kantlinje bakgrunn for en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the BorderBrush property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen BorderBrush som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to fill the control's border; the default is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Velgeren som brukes til å fylle kontrollens kantlinje; standard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border thickness of a control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjetykkelse for en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the BorderThickness property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen BorderThickness som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: A thickness value; the default is a thickness of 0 on all four sides.
trans-unit.target: En verdi for tykkelse. Standarden er tykkelse på 0 på alle fire sidene.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderThickness*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderThickness*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderThickness*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font family of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller Angir skriftfamilien for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the FontFamily property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen FontFamily som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: A font family.
trans-unit.target: Skriftfamilien.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system dialog font.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er system dialogboksen skriften.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontFamily*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontFamily*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontFamily*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font size.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriftstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the FontSize property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen FontSize som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* A string representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, , | ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` - or – ``` ## XAML verdier *doble* en strengrepresentasjon av en verdi.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Dette tolkes som en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] mål.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Strenger må eksplisitt inkluderer ikke desimaler.

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel verdien `1` godtas.

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions that are mentioned in the Property Value section apply here.
trans-unit.target: Den samme <xref:System.Double>intervallbegrensninger som er nevnt i delen egenskapsverdien bruker her.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as previously described that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* en *doble* verdien som beskrevet tidligere som etterfulgt av ett av disse enhetsstrenger deklarasjon: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **Note** In many cases a double may be set to "Auto," but a FontSize does not render if set to "Auto".
trans-unit.target: `px`(standard) er [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` er cm; 1 i == 96px `cm` er centimeter; 1cm==(96/2.54) piksler `pt` er punkt; 1pt==(96/72) piksler **Obs** i mange tilfeller kan du angi et langt flyttall "Auto", men en FontSize gjengir ikke Hvis satt til "Auto".

trans-unit.source: The size of the text in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på teksten i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The font size must be a positive number.
trans-unit.target: Skriftstørrelsen må være et positivt tall.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the degree to which a font is condensed or expanded on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor stor grad som er en skrift komprimert eller utvidet på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the FontStretch property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen FontStretch som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStretch*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStretch*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStretch*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriftstilen.

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the FontStyle property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen FontStyle som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStyle"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.FontStyles.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Windows.FontStyles.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStyle*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the weight or thickness of the specified font.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tykkelse eller angitt skrifttykkelsen.

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the FontWeight property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen FontWeight som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: For a list of predefined <xref:System.Windows.FontWeight> values, see the <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights> class.
trans-unit.target: En liste over forhåndsdefinerte <xref:System.Windows.FontWeight>verdier, se <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.FontWeights> </xref:System.Windows.FontWeight>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontWeight"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontWeight"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontWeight*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontWeight*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontWeight*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brush that describes the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en velgeren som beskriver forgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the Foreground property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen forgrunnen som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The brush that paints the foreground of the control.
trans-unit.target: Velgeren som maler forgrunnen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the system dialog font color.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er skriftfargen system dialogboksen.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control supports scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en kontroll støtter rulling.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen har en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> i malen og har et egendefinert tastatur rulling virkemåte; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the control's content.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir vannrett justering av kontrollens innhold.

trans-unit.source: In addition to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, and <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, you can set the HorizontalContentAlignment property to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, which stretches the child element to fill the allocated space of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, og <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, kan du angi egenskapen HorizontalContentAlignment <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, som strekker det underordnede elementet til å fylle tildelt plass for det overordnede elementet.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [justering, marger og utfylling oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the HorizontalContentAlignment property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen HorizontalContentAlignment som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a control is included in tab navigation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en kontroll er inkludert i kategorien navigasjon.

trans-unit.source: If IsTabStop is `false`, the control is excluded from tab navigation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IsTabStop `false`, kontrollen er ekskludert fra kategorien navigasjon.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is included in tab navigation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er inkludert i kategorien Navigasjon; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.IsTabStop*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.IsTabStop*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.IsTabStop*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Called to remeasure a control.
trans-unit.target: Kalles for å remeasure en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The default control measurement only measures the first visual child.
trans-unit.target: Standard kontrollen målingen måler bare første visual underordnede.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size that the method can return.
trans-unit.target: Maksimal størrelse som metoden kan returnere.

trans-unit.source: The size of the control, up to the maximum specified by constraint.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på kontrollen, opptil det høyeste constraint .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a mouse button is clicked two or more times.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en blir klikket to eller flere ganger.

trans-unit.source: Although this routed event seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised along the element tree by each <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: Selv om denne rutet hendelsen det ser ut til å gjøre en bubbling rute via et element-tre, er det faktisk en direkte rutet hendelse som oppstår langs treet elementet ved hver <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true` in a MouseDoubleClick event handler, subsequent MouseDoubleClick events along the route will occur with <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>egenskapen `true` i en MouseDoubleClick hendelsesbehandling etterfølgende MouseDoubleClick hendelsene langs ruten skjer med <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is a higher-level event for control consumers who want to be notified when the user double-clicks the control and to handle the event in an application.
trans-unit.target: Dette er et høyere nivå hendelsen for kontrollen forbrukere som vil bli varslet når brukeren dobbeltklikker kontrollen, og behandle hendelsen i en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Control authors who want to handle mouse double clicks should use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event when <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> is equal to two.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen forfattere som vil håndtere doble museklikk skal bruke den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>hendelsen når <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>er lik to.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: This will cause the state of <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to propagate appropriately in the case where another element in the element tree handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil føre til at tilstanden til <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>å overføre på riktig måte i tilfeller der et annet element i treet elementet behandler hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> class defines the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick> and MouseDoubleClick events, but not corresponding single-click events.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>klassen definerer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick>og MouseDoubleClick hendelser, men ikke tilsvarende hendelser i ett enkelt klikk.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: To see if the user has clicked the control once, handle the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> event (or one of its counterparts) and check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> property value is 1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se hvis brukeren har trykket kontrollen én gang, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>hendelse (eller en av kolleger) og kontroller om det <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>egenskapsverdien er 1.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Direct| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: ## Rutet hendelsesinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Rutingstrategi | Direkte | | Representanten | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event by calling the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>hendelsen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [rutet hendelser oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick> event by calling the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick>hendelsen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [rutet hendelser oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Called whenever the control's template changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når kontrollens malen endres.

trans-unit.source: The timing for changing the template is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: Tidspunktet for å endre malen er som følger: 1.

trans-unit.source: The template is changed by a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> method call, a style trigger, or some other means.
trans-unit.target: Malen er endret av en <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>metodekall, en stil utløser eller en annen metode.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property value changes; the property-changed callback is called.
trans-unit.target: Verdien egenskapsendringer; Endre egenskapen tilbakeringing kalles.

trans-unit.source: The old visual tree is removed.
trans-unit.target: Gamle visual treet fjernes.

trans-unit.source: An internal method is called which eventually calls the OnTemplateChanged method.
trans-unit.target: En intern metoden kalles som kaller oppgavestatusen OnTemplateChanged-metoden.

trans-unit.source: Later, during a measure, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A> is called and a new visual tree is attached.
trans-unit.target: Senere under et mål <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A>kalles og et nytt visual tre er tilknyttet.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The old template.
trans-unit.target: Den gamle malen.

trans-unit.source: The new template.
trans-unit.target: Den nye malen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding inside a control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir utfyllingen i en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Padding is specified in the order Left, Top, Right, and Bottom.
trans-unit.target: Utfyllingen er angitt i rekkefølge venstre, Top, høyre og nederste.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> and [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>og [justering, marger og utfylling oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Thickness>

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the Padding property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen utfyllingen som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`||

trans-unit.source: The amount of space between the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref> and its <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin*> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden mellom innholdet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"> </xref> og <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin*>eller <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Border"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a thickness of 0 on all four sides.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er tykkelse på 0 på alle fire sidene.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Padding*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Padding*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Padding*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user clicks the mouse button two or more times.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren klikker museknappen for to eller flere ganger.

trans-unit.source: Although this routed event seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised along the element tree by each <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: Selv om denne rutet hendelsen det ser ut til å gjøre en tunnelering rute via et element-tre, er det faktisk en direkte rutet hendelse som oppstår langs treet elementet ved hver <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true` in a PreviewMouseDoubleClick event handler, subsequent PreviewMouseDoubleClick events along the route will occur with <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> set to `false`, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event will occur with <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>egenskapen `true` i en PreviewMouseDoubleClick hendelsesbehandling etterfølgende PreviewMouseDoubleClick hendelsene langs ruten skjer med <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>satt til `false`, men <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>hendelsen skjer med <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is a higher-level event for control consumers who want to be notified when the user double-clicks the control and to handle the event in an application.
trans-unit.target: Dette er et høyere nivå hendelsen for kontrollen forbrukere som vil bli varslet når brukeren dobbeltklikker kontrollen, og behandle hendelsen i en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Control authors who want to handle mouse double clicks should use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event when <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> is equal to two.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen forfattere som vil håndtere doble museklikk skal bruke den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>hendelsen når <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>er lik to.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: This will cause the state of <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to propagate appropriately in the case where another element in the element tree handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil føre til at tilstanden til <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>å overføre på riktig måte i tilfeller der et annet element i treet elementet behandler hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> class defines the PreviewMouseDoubleClick and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> events, but not corresponding single-click events.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>klassen definerer PreviewMouseDoubleClick og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>hendelser, men ikke tilsvarende hendelser i ett enkelt klikk.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: To see if the user has clicked the control once, handle the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> event (or one of its counterparts) and check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> property value is 1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se hvis brukeren har trykket kontrollen én gang, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>hendelse (eller en av kolleger) og kontroller om det <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>egenskapsverdien er 1.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Direct| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: ## Rutet hendelsesinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Rutingstrategi | Direkte | | Representanten | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the order in which elements receive focus when the user navigates through controls by using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer rekkefølgen der elementer får fokus når brukeren navigerer gjennom kontroller ved hjelp av nøkkelen kategorien.

trans-unit.source: A control with a lower tab index receives focus before a control with a higher index.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll med lavere kategorien indeks mottar fokus før en kontroll med en høyere indeks.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A value that determines the order of logical navigation for a device.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som bestemmer rekkefølgen for logisk navigasjon for en enhet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.TabIndex*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.TabIndex*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.TabIndex*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a control template.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en kontrollmal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> specifies the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>; if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> will not appear in your application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>Angir utseendet til en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>; Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>har ikke en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>vises ikke i programmet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The control author defines the default control template, and the application author can override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to redefine the visual tree of the control.
trans-unit.target: Forfatteren av kontrollen definerer kontrollen standardmalen, og forfatteren av programmet kan overstyre den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>omdefinere visual treet kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: See [Control Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for information and examples of how to change the visual tree of existing controls.
trans-unit.target: Se [kontrollen stiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for informasjon og eksempler på hvordan du endrer visual treet for eksisterende kontroller.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is intended to be a self-contained unit of implementation detail that is invisible to outside users and objects, including <xref:System.Windows.Style> objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>skal være Avgrenset ledd detaljnivå implementering som er usynlig for utenfor brukere og -objekter, inkludert <xref:System.Windows.Style>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Style> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The only way to manipulate the content of the control template is from within the same control template.
trans-unit.target: Den eneste måten å endre innholdet i malen kontrollen er fra i samme kontrollmal.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`||

trans-unit.source: The template that defines the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Malen som definerer hvordan de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Template*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Template*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Template*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer strengrepresentasjon av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Control authors should override this method to return a string that contains information that would be of interest to consumers of the control.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen forfattere må overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil returnere en streng som inneholder informasjon som vil være interessant for forbrukere for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the control's content.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den loddrette justeringen av kontrollens innhold.

trans-unit.source: In addition to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, and <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, you can set the VerticalContentAlignment property to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, which stretches the child element to fill the allocated layout space of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, og <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, kan du angi egenskapen VerticalContentAlignment <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, som strekker det underordnede elementet til å fylle plass tildelt oppsettet for det overordnede elementet.</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [justering, marger og utfylling oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the VerticalContentAlignment property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare en kontroll som malen bruker egenskapen VerticalContentAlignment som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.VerticalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.VerticalAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.VerticalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.VerticalAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
